attributes.action: Please publish your Tax Returns, David Cameron
attributes.additional_details: After pledging that he would do so, David Cameron has now back-tracked and refused to publish his tax returns. In a democratic society, where we, the Tax Payer, employ HIM, it is only correct that he, as an employee of ours, keeps to promises made. The issue resonates with even more vigour after the swathe of avoidance issues since 2010. Please sign if you agree.
